definition: a failure to perform some promised act or obligation, to make an opening or gap in
details:
noun
- a failure to perform some promised act or obligation
- a personal or social separation, as between opposing factions
= example: a personal or social separation, as between opposing factions
= synonyms: break, rupture, severance, rift, falling out
- an opening (especially a gap in a dike or fortification)
verb
- to make an opening or gap in
= example: to make an opening or gap in
= synonyms: gap
- to act in disregard of laws, rules, contracts, or promises
= example: to act in disregard of laws, rules, contracts, or promises
= synonyms: break
